description:
Hike your favourite trails with ease. The classic KeenTarghee hiking shoe gets a flexible panel over the toe to reduce energy needed for each step. The design is durable and won't crack and weaken over time. Great for a variety of conditions, thanks to the waterproof membrane and all-terrain sole.

  • Environmentally-preferred leather and mesh uppers
  • Keen.Dry waterproof-breathable membrane keeps water out
  • Webbing heel capture system locks in your foot
  • Keen.Bellows Flex panel adds efficiency
  • Dual-density, compression-moulded EVA midsole with torsion stability shank absorbs impacts and provides support
  • Non-marking Keen.All-Terrain rubber outsoles with 5mm lugs
name: Keen Ridge Flex Waterproof Light Trail Shoes - Men's
